Goblean is a funny game built by Gilles: Goblean is a funny game built by Gilles Masclef (Le Gobelin) and Benoît Mariat.
You are free to share this game around y: You are free to share this game around you.
Welcome to the great battle in the Goble: Welcome to the great battle in the Goble-aena!
This Goblean is ready to fight: This Goblean is ready to fight
Goblean are small creatures which live a: Goblean are small creatures which live all around us. There are hidden and stay immobile while you are watching them. But they have one default! They all have a tatoo which looks like a bar code (which is called EAN13).
Enter the EAN code of the creature you h: Enter the EAN code of the creature you have catched in this application and it will reveal its original form.
Enter the EAN code of a second creature: Enter the EAN code of a second creature (catched by a friend) and let them fight
At each round you can select an attack w: At each round you can select an attack which will be more or less powerful depending of your goblean stats and the defense of your opponent.
If your Goblean survive, it will be decl: If your Goblean survive, it will be declaled champion of the Goble-aena. (Then it can be defied by another challenger)
Players have to choose the tactical choi: Players have to choose the tactical choices
The tactical choices will be chosen auto: The tactical choices will be chosen automatically
